prompt: A young, adorable Ganesha with a round, ball-like body, around 5 to 10 years old, riding a modern motorcycle on a bustling Indian highway. He has large, shiny, expressive eyes and an attractive, charming look. His elephant trunk sways slightly with the wind as he grips the handlebars confidently. The scene captures a vibrant Indian road with auto-rickshaws, colorful trucks, and roadside stalls in the background. The sky is warm and golden, hinting at early morning or late afternoon. The bike is stylish, sleek, and well-lit, complementing Ganesha's divine aura. The overall style is highly detailed, semi-realistic, with a touch of fantasy lighting that enhances the divine glow around Ganesha
